function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey includes a mix of urban and suburban residents, potentially representing different levels of exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data could lead to ineffective public health measures for specific demographics.","Mitigation":"Conduct further analysis to determine the specific health risks and needs of urban and suburban residents.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software for demographic segmentation and public health data visualization.","People":"Urban and suburban residents","Owner":"Public health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"Respondents aged 19 to 70 years were included in the survey, potentially encompassing different susceptibility to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and mitigation strategies due to variability in susceptibility based on age.","Mitigation":"Analyze age-related trends to tailor disease prevention efforts to different age groups.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data visualization tools for age-specific disease risk analysis.","People":"Different age groups within the population","Owner":"Public health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"Survey examines advantages and disadvantages of living in apartments and houses during the pandemic, potentially uncovering environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","Impact":"Identifying environmental risk factors that contribute to disease transmission and require targeted mitigation measures.","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed environmental assessments to identify specific risk factors and implement targeted interventions.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technology for indoor air quality and disease transmission modeling.","People":"Residents of apartments and houses","Owner":"Public health authorities and environmental health organizations"}]}
